HeroClassSecondary: <Optional Second class - write None if no second class>
HitSound: <Sound made when you take damage. Example - Beast Hit 1caster>
ID: <subclassID example - mercenary. Must match the name of the file, be lowercase no special characters>
SpriteBorderLocked: <Sprite used when your character hasn't been unlocked. example- MagnusSilueta>
Trait0: <ID of your innate - Example. ulfvitrcalltherain. I recommend including the charactername before the actual name, but not necessary. All lowercase.>
Trait1A: <ID of your Left hand side, level 2 upgrade - Example. ulfvitrstormchanneler>.
Trait1B: <ID of your Right hand side, level 2 upgrade - Example. ulfvitrwatersoflife>
Trait2A: <ID of your Left hand side, level 3 upgrade - Example. ulfvitrmagnet>
Trait2B: <ID of your Right hand side, level 3 upgrade - Example. ulfvitrregenerator>
Trait3A: <ID of your Left hand side, level 4 upgrade - Example. ulfvitrelectriccurrent>
Trait3B: <ID of your Right hand side, level 4 upgrade - Example. ulfvitrtearsofthespirits>
Trait4A: <ID of your Left hand side, level 5 upgrade - Example. ulfvitrconductor>
Trait4B: <ID of your Right hand side, level 5 upgrade - Example. ulfvitrlifebloom>
